snippet: The easy terms of many home equity lines of credit are about to end, as borrowers will have to start paying principal as well as interest.
abstract: Gretchen Morgenson Fair Game column welcomes signs of life in housing but contends that even a strong recovery is unlikely to rescue many homeowners who are straining under the weight of multiple mortgages; holds the easy terms of many home equity lines of credit are about to end, as many borrowers will have to start paying principal as well as interest; notes that in many cases, the homes that were collateral for the loans have lost much of their value.
lead_paragraph: The easy terms of many home equity lines of credit are about to end, as borrowers will have to start paying principal as well as interest.
